verses.verse: Now Jacob <S%H3290><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that there <S%H3426><s%> was grain <S%H7668><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> "Why <S%H4100><s%> are you staring <S%H7200><s%> at one another?"

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have heard <S%H8085><s%> that there <S%H3426><s%> is grain <S%H7668><s%> in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> and buy <S%H7666><s%> [some] for us from that place, <S%H8033><s%> so that we may live <S%H2421><s%> and not die. <S%H4191><s%>"
Then ten <S%H6235><s%> brothers <S%H251><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> grain <S%H1250><s%> from Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

But Jacob <S%H3290><s%> did not send <S%H7971><s%> Joseph's brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> with his brothers, <S%H251><s%> for he said, <S%H559><s%> "I am afraid that harm <S%H611><s%> may befall <S%H7122><s%> him."

So the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> grain <S%H7666><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> those who were coming, <S%H935><s%> for the famine <S%H7458><s%> was in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> [also.]

Now Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was the ruler <S%H7989><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> he was the one who sold <S%H7666><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%> And Joseph's brothers <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and bowed <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to him with [their] faces <S%H639><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

When Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> he recognized <S%H5234><s%> them, but he disguised <S%H9330><s%> himself to them and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them harshly. <S%H7186><s%> And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Where <S%H370><s%> have you come <S%H935><s%> from?" And they said, <S%H559><s%> "From the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> food. <S%H400><s%>"
But Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had recognized <S%H5234><s%> his brothers, <S%H251><s%> although they did not recognize <S%H5234><s%> him.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> the dreams <S%H2472><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had <S%H2492><s%> about them, and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "You are spies; <S%H7270><s%> you have come <S%H935><s%> to look <S%H7200><s%> at the undefended <S%H6172><s%> parts <S%H6172><s%> of our land. <S%H776><s%>"
Then they said <S%H559><s%> to him, "No, <S%H3808><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> but your servants <S%H5650><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> food. <S%H400><s%>
"We are all <S%H3605><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man; <S%H376><s%> we are honest <S%H9210><s%> men, <S%H9210><s%> your servants <S%H5650><s%> are not spies. <S%H7270><s%>"
Yet he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "No, <S%H3808><s%> but you have come <S%H935><s%> to look <S%H7200><s%> at the undefended <S%H6172><s%> parts <S%H6172><s%> of our land! <S%H776><s%>"

But they said, <S%H559><s%> "Your servants <S%H5650><s%> are twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> brothers <S%H251><s%> [in all,] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the youngest <S%H9512><s%> is with our father today, <S%H1><s%> and one <S%H3117><s%> is no <S%H259><s%> more. <S%H369><s%>"
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "It is as I said <S%H1696><s%> to you, you are spies; <S%H7270><s%>

by this <S%H2088><s%> you will be tested: <S%H974><s%> by the life <S%H2416><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> you shall not go <S%H3318><s%> from this <S%H2088><s%> place unless <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> your youngest <S%H9512><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> here! <S%H2008><s%>

"Send <S%H7971><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of you that he may get <S%H3947><s%> your brother, <S%H251><s%> while you remain confined, <S%H631><s%> that your words <S%H1697><s%> may be tested, <S%H974><s%> whether there is truth <S%H571><s%> in you. But if <S%H518><s%> not, by the life <S%H2416><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> surely <S%H3588><s%> you are spies. <S%H7270><s%>"
So he put <S%H622><s%> them all <S%H622><s%> together <S%H622><s%> in prison <S%H4929><s%> for three <S%H7969><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

Now Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> "Do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> and live, <S%H2421><s%> for I fear <S%H3372><s%> God: <S%H430><s%>

if <S%H518><s%> you are honest <S%H9210><s%> men, <S%H9210><s%> let one <S%H259><s%> of your brothers <S%H251><s%> be confined <S%H631><s%> in your prison <S%H1004><s%>; <S%H4929><s%> but as for [the rest of] you, go, <S%H1980><s%> carry <S%H935><s%> grain <S%H7668><s%> for the famine <S%H7459><s%> of your households, <S%H1004><s%>

and bring <S%H935><s%> your youngest <S%H9512><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> to me, so your words <S%H1697><s%> may be verified, <S%H539><s%> and you will not die. <S%H4191><s%> "And they did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>

Then they said <S%H559><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> "Truly <S%H61><s%> we are guilty <S%H818><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> our brother, <S%H251><s%> because <S%H834><s%> we saw <S%H7200><s%> the distress <S%H6869><s%> of his soul <S%H5315><s%> when he pleaded <S%H2603><s%> with us, yet we would not listen; <S%H8085><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> distress <S%H6869><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> upon us."

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> "Did I not tell <S%H559><s%> you, 'Do not sin <S%H2398><s%> against the boy <S%H3206><s%>'; and you would not listen <S%H8085><s%>? Now <S%H1571><s%> <S%H2009><s%> comes <S%H1875><s%> the reckoning <S%H1875><s%> for his blood. <S%H1818><s%>"
They did not know, <S%H3045><s%> however, that Joseph <S%H3130><s%> understood, <S%H8085><s%> for there was an interpreter <S%H9238><s%> between <S%H996><s%> them.

And he turned <S%H5437><s%> away <S%H5437><s%> from them and wept. <S%H1058><s%> But when he returned <S%H7725><s%> to them and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them, he took <S%H3947><s%> Simeon <S%H8095><s%> from them and bound <S%H631><s%> him before their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gave <S%H6680><s%> orders <S%H6680><s%> to fill <S%H4390><s%> their bags <S%H3627><s%> with grain <S%H1250><s%> and to restore <S%H7725><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man's money <S%H3701><s%> in his sack, <S%H8242><s%> and to give <S%H5414><s%> them provisions <S%H6720><s%> for the journey. <S%H1870><s%> And thus <S%H3651><s%> it was done <S%H6213><s%> for them.
So they loaded <S%H5375><s%> their donkeys <S%H2543><s%> with their grain, <S%H7668><s%> and departed <S%H1980><s%> from there. <S%H8033><s%>

And as one <S%H259><s%> [of them] opened <S%H6605><s%> his sack <S%H8242><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> his donkey <S%H2543><s%> fodder <S%H4554><s%> at the lodging <S%H4411><s%> place, <S%H4411><s%> he saw <S%H7200><s%> his money; <S%H3701><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of his sack. <S%H572><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> "My money <S%H3701><s%> has been returned, <S%H7725><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is even <S%H1571><s%> in my sack. <S%H572><s%>" And their hearts <S%H3820><s%> sank, <S%H3318><s%> and they [turned] trembling <S%H2729><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> to us?"

When they came <S%H935><s%> to their father Jacob <S%H1><s%> in the land <S%H3290><s%> of Canaan, <S%H776><s%> they told <S%H3667><s%> him all <S%H5046><s%> that had happened <S%H3605><s%> to them, saying, <S%H7136><s%>

"The man, <S%H376><s%> the lord <S%H113><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> harshly <S%H7186><s%> with us, and took <S%H5414><s%> us for spies <S%H7270><s%> of the country. <S%H776><s%>
"But we said <S%H559><s%> to him, 'We are honest <S%H9210><s%> men; <S%H9210><s%> we are not spies. <S%H7270><s%>

'We are twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> brothers, <S%H251><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of our father; one <S%H1><s%> is no <S%H259><s%> more, <S%H369><s%> and the youngest <S%H369><s%> is with our father today <S%H9512><s%> in the land <S%H1><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3117><s%>'

"And the man, <S%H376><s%> the lord <S%H113><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to us, 'By this <S%H2088><s%> I shall know <S%H3045><s%> that you are honest <S%H9210><s%> men: <S%H9210><s%> leave <S%H5117><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of your brothers <S%H251><s%> with me and take <S%H3947><s%> [grain for] the famine <S%H7459><s%> of your households, <S%H1004><s%> and go. <S%H1980><s%>

'But bring <S%H935><s%> your youngest <S%H9512><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> to me that I may know <S%H3045><s%> that you are not spies, <S%H7270><s%> but honest <S%H9210><s%> men. <S%H9210><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> to you, and you may trade <S%H5503><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>' "

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about as they were emptying <S%H9553><s%> their sacks, <S%H8242><s%> that behold, <S%H2009><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man's bundle <S%H6872><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%> [was] in his sack; <S%H8242><s%> and when they and their father saw <S%H1><s%> their bundles <S%H7200><s%> of money, <S%H6872><s%> they were dismayed. <S%H3701><s%>

And their father Jacob <S%H1><s%> said <S%H3290><s%> to them, "You have bereaved <S%H559><s%> me of my children: <S%H7921><s%> Joseph <S%H7921><s%> is no <S%H3130><s%> more, <S%H369><s%> and Simeon <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H8095><s%> more, <S%H369><s%> and you would take <S%H369><s%> Benjamin; <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H1144><s%> these things are against <S%H3605><s%> me."

Then Reuben <S%H7205><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to his father, saying, <S%H1><s%> "You may put <S%H559><s%> my two <S%H4191><s%> sons <S%H8147><s%> to death <S%H1121><s%> if <S%H4191><s%> I do not bring <S%H518><s%> him [back] to you; put <S%H935><s%> him in my care, <S%H5414><s%> and I will return <S%H3027><s%> him to you."

But Jacob said, <S%H559><s%> "My son <S%H1121><s%> shall not go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with you; for his brother <S%H251><s%> is dead, <S%H4191><s%> and he alone <S%H905><s%> is left. <S%H7604><s%> If harm <S%H611><s%> should befall <S%H7122><s%> him on the journey <S%H1870><s%> you are taking, <S%H1980><s%> then you will bring <S%H3381><s%> my gray <S%H7872><s%> hair <S%H7872><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> in sorrow. <S%H3015><s%>"
